actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income a certain amount of interest earned on the All Savers Certificate offered only at savings institutions.

summary.text: The All Savers Act of 1981 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income $1,000 ($2,000 for joint returns) of the interest earned on an All Savers Certificate in taxable years 1981, 1982, and 1983.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income a certain amount of interest earned on the All Savers Certificate offered only at savings institutions.
